Parent Noticeboard

Come along and have a schmooze…

NB: While there is no charge for this event, we have included a suggested donation to help cover the costs, though any donations will be gratefully received and will be used to contribute towards the work of the Parent Council in supporting the educational experience of all of the children at the school.

Welcome back…

Welcome back to all of you whose kids are returning to Hyndland Primary for the new school year and welcome to all of you whose kids are new to the school, whether in P1 or across the school years. We hope that you and your children all had a great summer, enjoyed the unusual and […]

Donate to Parent Council

In response to requests for the ability to make donations to the Parent Council funds outwith events, we now have a PayPal account to allow parents, carers and wider families to donate towards resources for the school.

  • About

This website is for parents and carers of pupils at Hyndland Primary School and it is run by its Parent Council.

If you’d like to receive e-mail updates, please e-mail us and we can add you to the mailing list.

On the other hand, if you would like to contact the school directly, you can do so by calling them on 0141 339 7207

  • School Twitter

Website maintained by Hyndland Primary Parent Council & Ali Walker
